title: Boost productivity with this AI-driven text & speech app — $29.97 through 1/1
content:
Macworld

Studies reveal that people are more productive and healthier when they have a good work-life balance. But that achievement is difficult to attain. Need some help? Then try using the Jott Pro AI Text and Speech Toolkit, offered with year-end savings of $170 off the regular price.

Jott Pro is an AI-assisted text and speech app that could potentially save the average worker several hours every week. Use it to dictate emails and other written documents, translate languages, extract text from images, and more. And it does all of this with unprecedented accuracy so you’ll spend much less time editing than you might with other apps.

A lifetime subscription gives you access to all of Jott Pro’s features. All you need is a modern web browser to get started, you can use it on both desktop and mobile devices, and updates to the software are included so it’ll always remain cutting edge. It’s a great way to boost your productivity and, at this price, it won’t come anywhere close to breaking the bank.

Get a lifetime license of the Jott Pro AI Text and Speech Toolkit for just $29.97 (reg. $199.99), but only until January 1, 2024 at 11:59pm.
